001package imagingbook.pub.geometry.homography;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Random;
006
007import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateMatrixFunction;
008import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateVectorFunction;
009import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory;
010import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer.Optimum;
011import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresProblem;
012import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer;
013import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
014import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
015import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
016
017import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
018import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Point;
019import imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.ProjectiveMapping2D;
020
021/**
022 * This class defines methods for estimating the homography (projective)
023 * transformation between pairs of 2D point sets.
024 * It works in two steps:
025 * First, an initial estimate of the homography is obtained with the
026 * "direct linear transform" method.
027 * Second, iterative, non-linear Levenberg-Marquart (LM) optimization is applied
028 * to find the final fit.
029 *
030 * @author WB
031 * @version 2020/05/19
032 */
033public class HomographyEstimator {
034
035        private static int MaxLmEvaluations = 1000;
036        private static int MaxLmIterations = 1000;
037
038        private final boolean normalizePointCoordinates;
039        private final boolean doNonlinearRefinement;
040
041        // ------------------------------------------------------------
042
043        public HomographyEstimator() {
044                this(true, true);
045        }
046
047        public HomographyEstimator(boolean normalizePointCoordinates, boolean doNonlinearRefinement) {
048                this.normalizePointCoordinates = normalizePointCoordinates;
049                this.doNonlinearRefinement = doNonlinearRefinement;
050        }
051
052        // ------------------------------------------------------------
053
054        /**
055         * Estimates the homography (projective transformation) from two given 2D point sets
056         * and returns a {@linkplain ProjectiveMapping2D} instance.
057         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
058         * @param P the 1st sequence of 2D points 
059         * @param Q the 2nd sequence of 2D points
060         * @return the estimated homography (instance of type {@linkplain ProjectiveMapping2D})
061         */
062        public ProjectiveMapping2D getHomographyMapping(Point[] P, Point[] Q) {
063                RealMatrix H = getHomography(P, Q);
064                return new ProjectiveMapping2D(H.getData());
065        }
066
067        /**
068         * Estimates the homography (projective transformation) from two given 2D point sets.
069         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
070         * @param P the 1st sequence of 2D points 
071         * @param Q the 2nd sequence of 2D points
072         * @return the estimated homography (3 x 3 matrix)
073         */
074        public RealMatrix getHomography(Point[] P, Point[] Q) {
075                if (P.length != Q.length) {
076                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("getHomography(): P and Q must be of same length");
077                }
078                int n = P.length;
079                
080                // input point sets are normalized (to zero mean, unit variance) if required:
081                RealMatrix Id = MatrixUtils.createRealIdentityMatrix(3);
082                RealMatrix Na = (normalizePointCoordinates) ? MathUtil.getNormalisationMatrix(P) : Id;
083                RealMatrix Nb = (normalizePointCoordinates) ? MathUtil.getNormalisationMatrix(Q) : Id;  
084                RealMatrix M = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(n * 2, 9);
085
086                // find an initial solution using the DLT
087                for (int j = 0, r = 0; j < P.length; j++) {
088                        final double[] pA = MathUtil.transform(P[j].toArray(), Na);
089                        final double[] pB = MathUtil.transform(Q[j].toArray(), Nb);
090                        final double xA = pA[0];
091                        final double yA = pA[1];
092                        final double xB = pB[0];
093                        final double yB = pB[1];                        
094                        M.setRow(r + 0, new double[] {xA, yA, 1, 0, 0, 0, -(xA * xB), -(yA * xB), -(xB)});
095                        M.setRow(r + 1, new double[] {0, 0, 0, xA, yA, 1, -(xA * yB), -(yA * yB), -(yB)});
096                        r = r + 2;
097                }
098
099                // find h, such that M . h = 0:
100                double[] h = MathUtil.solveHomogeneousSystem(M).toArray();
101
102                // assemble homography matrix H from h:
103                RealMatrix H = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][] 
104                                {{h[0], h[1], h[2]},
105                                 {h[3], h[4], h[5]},
106                                 {h[6], h[7], h[8]}} );
107
108                // de-normalize the homography
109                if (normalizePointCoordinates) {
110                        H = MatrixUtils.inverse(Nb).multiply(H).multiply(Na);
111                }
112
113                // rescale M such that H[2][2] = 1 (unless H[2][2] close to 0)
114                if (Math.abs(H.getEntry(2, 2)) > 10e-8) {
115                        H = H.scalarMultiply(1.0 / H.getEntry(2, 2));
116                }
117                else {
118                        throw new RuntimeException("estimateHomography(): H could not be normalized");
119                }
120
121                // refine the solution using non-linear optimization if required
122                return doNonlinearRefinement ? refineHomography(H, P, Q) : H;
123        }
124
125        /**
126         * Estimates the homographies between a fixed set of 2D model points and
127         * multiple observations (image point sets).
128         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
129         * TODO: This should not be here.
130         * @param modelPts a sequence of 2D points on the model (calibration target)
131         * @param obsPoints a sequence 2D image point sets (one set per view).
132         * @return the sequence of estimated homographies (3 x 3 matrices), one for each view
133         * @deprecated
134         */
135        public RealMatrix[] getHomographies(Point[] modelPts, Point[][] obsPoints) {
136                final int M = obsPoints.length;
137                RealMatrix[] homographies = new RealMatrix[M];
138                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
139                        homographies[i] = getHomography(modelPts, obsPoints[i]);
140                }
141                return homographies;
142        }
143
144        /**
145         * Refines the initial homography by non-linear (Levenberg-Marquart) optimization.
146         * @param Hinit the initial (estimated) homography matrix
147         * @param pntsA the 1st sequence of 2D points 
148         * @param pntsB the 2nd sequence of 2D points
149         * @return the refined homography matrix
150         */
151        private static RealMatrix refineHomography(RealMatrix Hinit, Point[] pntsA, Point[] pntsB) {
152                final int M = pntsA.length;             
153                double[] observed = new double[2 * M];
154                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
155                        observed[i * 2 + 0] = pntsB[i].getX();
156                        observed[i * 2 + 1] = pntsB[i].getY();
157                }                       
158                MultivariateVectorFunction value = getValueFunction(pntsA);
159                MultivariateMatrixFunction jacobian = getJacobianFunction(pntsA);
160
161                LeastSquaresProblem problem = LeastSquaresFactory.create(
162                                LeastSquaresFactory.model(value, jacobian),
163                                MatrixUtils.createRealVector(observed), 
164                                MathUtil.getRowPackedVector(Hinit), 
165                                null,  // ConvergenceChecker
166                                MaxLmEvaluations, 
167                                MaxLmIterations);
168
169                LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer lm = new LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer();
170                Optimum result = lm.optimize(problem);
171
172                RealVector optimum = result.getPoint();
173                RealMatrix Hopt = MathUtil.fromRowPackedVector(optimum, 3, 3);
174                int iterations = result.getIterations();
175                if (iterations >= MaxLmIterations) {
176                        throw new RuntimeException("refineHomography(): max. number of iterations exceeded");
177                }
178                //System.out.println("LM optimizer iterations " + iterations);
179                return Hopt.scalarMultiply(1.0 / Hopt.getEntry(2, 2));
180        }
181
182
183        private static MultivariateVectorFunction getValueFunction(Point[] X) {
184                //System.out.println("MultivariateVectorFunction getValueFunction");
185                return new MultivariateVectorFunction() {
186                        public double[] value(double[] h) {                     
187                                final double[] Y = new double[X.length * 2];
188                                for (int j = 0; j < X.length; j++) {
189                                        final double x = X[j].getX();
190                                        final double y = X[j].getY();
191                                        final double w = h[6] * x + h[7] * y + h[8];
192                                        Y[j * 2 + 0] = (h[0] * x + h[1] * y + h[2]) / w;
193                                        Y[j * 2 + 1] = (h[3] * x + h[4] * y + h[5]) / w;
194                                }
195                                return Y;
196                        }
197                };
198        }
199
200        private static MultivariateMatrixFunction getJacobianFunction(Point[] X) {
201                return new MultivariateMatrixFunction() {
202                        public double[][] value(double[] h) {
203                                final double[][] J = new double[2 * X.length][];
204                                for (int i = 0; i < X.length; i++) {
205                                        final double x = X[i].getX();
206                                        final double y = X[i].getY();
207
208                                        final double w  = h[6] * x + h[7] * y + h[8];
209                                        final double w2 = w * w;
210
211                                        final double sx = h[0] * x + h[1] * y + h[2];           
212                                        J[2 * i + 0] = new double[] {x/w, y/w, 1/w, 0, 0, 0, -sx*x/w2, -sx*y/w2, -sx/w2};
213
214                                        final double sy = h[3] * x + h[4] * y + h[5];
215                                        J[2 * i + 1] = new double[] {0, 0, 0, x/w, y/w, 1/w, -sy*x/w2, -sy*y/w2, -sy/w2};
216                                }
217                                return J;
218                        }
219                };
220        }
221

314
315        // TESTING --------------------------------------------------------
316
317        static double NOISE = 0.1;
318
319        private static Point mapPoint(RealMatrix H, Point p) {
320                double[] xa = p.toArray(); // {p.getX(), p.getY()};
321                double[] xb = MathUtil.transform(xa, H);
322                return Point.create(xb);
323        }
324
325        private static Random rand = new Random();
326
327        private static Point mapPointWithNoise(RealMatrix H, Point p, double noise) {
328                double[] xa = {p.getX(), p.getY()};
329                double[] xb = MathUtil.transform(xa, H);
330                double xn = noise * rand.nextGaussian();
331                double yn = noise * rand.nextGaussian();
332                return Point.create(xb[0] + xn, xb[1] + yn);
333        }
334
335        /**
336         * Used for testing only.
337         * @param args ignored
338         */
339        public static void main(String[] args) {
340                RealMatrix Hreal = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][]
341                                {{3, 2, -1},
342                        {5, 0, 2},
343                        {4, 4, 9}});
344
345                System.out.println("H (real) = ");
346                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hreal.scalarMultiply(1/Hreal.getEntry(2, 2)).getData()));
347                //              System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hreal.getData()));
348
349                List<Point> pntlistA = new ArrayList<Point>();
350                pntlistA.add(Point.create(10, 7));
351                pntlistA.add(Point.create(3, -1));
352                pntlistA.add(Point.create(5, 5));
353                pntlistA.add(Point.create(-6, 13));
354                pntlistA.add(Point.create(0, 1));
355                pntlistA.add(Point.create(2, 3));
356
357                List<Point> pntlistB = new ArrayList<Point>();
358                for (Point a : pntlistA) {
359                        pntlistB.add(mapPointWithNoise(Hreal, a, NOISE));
360                }
361
362                Point[] pntsA = pntlistA.toArray(new Point[0]);
363                Point[] pntsB = pntlistB.toArray(new Point[0]);
364
365
366                System.out.println("\nPoint correspondences:");
367                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
368                        Point a = pntsA[i];
369                        Point b = pntsB[i];
370                        System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f)\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), b.getX(), b.getY());
371                }
372                System.out.println();
373
374                System.out.println("\n*************** WITHOUT NONLINEAR REFINEMENT *****************");
375                runTestDLT(new HomographyEstimator(true, false), pntsA, pntsB);
376
377                System.out.println("\n*************** WITH NONLINEAR REFINEMENT *****************");
378                runTestDLT(new HomographyEstimator(true, true), pntsA, pntsB);
379
380                System.out.println("\n*************** USING LEAST-SQUARES MAPPING *****************");
381                runTestLeastSquares(pntsA, pntsB);
382
383                System.out.println("\n*************** GENERATE A MAPPING *****************");
384                ProjectiveMapping2D pm = new HomographyEstimator().getHomographyMapping(pntsA, pntsB);
385                System.out.println("projective mapping = \n" + pm.toString());
386
387        }
388
389        private static void runTestDLT(HomographyEstimator he, Point[] pntsA, Point[] pntsB) {
390                RealMatrix Hest = he.getHomography(pntsA, pntsB);
391
392                System.out.println("H (estim.) = "); 
393                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hest.getData()));
394
395                Point[] pntsC = new Point[pntsA.length];
396                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {        
397                        pntsC[i] = mapPoint(Hest, pntsA[i]);
398                }
399
400                System.out.println("\nPoints mapped:");
401                double sumDist2 = 0;
402                double maxDist2 = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
403                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
404                        Point a = pntsA[i];
405                        Point b = pntsB[i];
406                        Point c = pntsC[i];
407                        double dist2 = b.distance2(c);
408                        sumDist2 += dist2;
409                        maxDist2 = Math.max(maxDist2, dist2);
410                        System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f) d=%.4f\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), c.getX(), c.getY(), dist2);
411                }
412                System.out.format("\nTotal error = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(sumDist2));
413                System.out.format("Max. dist = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(maxDist2));   
414        }
415
416        private static void runTestLeastSquares(Point[] pntsA, Point[] pntsB) {
417                ProjectiveMapping2D mapping = ProjectiveMapping2D.fromPoints(pntsA, pntsB);
418                double[][] Hmap = mapping.getTransformationMatrix();
419                System.out.println("H (mapping) = "); 
420                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hmap));
421                {
422                        Point[] pntsC = new Point[pntsA.length];
423                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {        
424                                pntsC[i] = (Point) mapping.applyTo(Point.create(pntsA[i].getX(), pntsA[i].getY()));
425                        }
426
427                        System.out.println("\nPoints mapped:");
428                        double sumDist2 = 0;
429                        double maxDist2 = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
430                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
431                                Point a = pntsA[i];
432                                Point b = pntsB[i];
433                                Point c = pntsC[i];
434                                double dist2 = b.distance2(c);
435                                sumDist2 += dist2;
436                                maxDist2 = Math.max(maxDist2, dist2);
437                                System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f) d=%.4f\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), c.getX(), c.getY(), dist2);
438                        }
439                        System.out.format("\nTotal error = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(sumDist2));
440                        System.out.format("Max. dist = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(maxDist2));
441                }
442                {
443                        System.out.println("   +++ running refinement ++++");
444                        RealMatrix Hinit = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(Hmap);
445                        RealMatrix Hest = refineHomography(Hinit, pntsA, pntsB);
446                        System.out.println("H (estim.) = "); 
447                        System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hest.getData()));
448
449                        Point[] pntsC = new Point[pntsA.length];
450                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {        
451                                pntsC[i] = mapPoint(Hest, pntsA[i]);
452                        }
453
454                        //                      System.out.println("\nPoints mapped:");
455                        double sumDist2 = 0;
456                        double maxDist2 = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
457                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
458                                Point a = pntsA[i];
459                                Point b = pntsB[i];
460                                Point c = pntsC[i];
461                                double dist2 = b.distance2(c);
462                                sumDist2 += dist2;
463                                maxDist2 = Math.max(maxDist2, dist2);
464                                //                              System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f) d=%.4f\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), c.getX(), c.getY(), dist2);
465                        }
466                        System.out.format("\nTotal error = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(sumDist2));
467                        System.out.format("Max. dist = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(maxDist2));   
468                }
469        }
470
471}
